analysis_summary: The model identifies several high-expected-value (EV) player prop 'GO' recommendations concentrated on the DAL@LAL game, notably LeBron James (two props), Austin Reaves, Marcus Smart, and Jake LaRavia. The deterministic model uses market-implied probabilities with manual adjustments for injuries and rostering, but it also lists explicit gaps: minutes/usage projections and correlation treatments follow deterministic v0 rules rather than learned distributions. External reporting indicates Austin Reaves has recent significant injury developments, which could affect availability and model reliability for his listed prop.
bottom_line: The model highlights attractive EV plays, mainly in DAL@LAL, but its deterministic handling of minutes/usage and correlation is a stated gap. More importantly, external news shows Austin Reaves has a significant calf injury with uncertain availability; that materially undermines any Reaves prop recommendation and raises caution for model outputs tied to roster/injury assumptions. Evidence quality for injury impact is strong (multiple news reports). If you act on these GO recommendations, verify up-to-the-minute injury reports and starting-lineup confirmations before placing bets.

refuting_facts.fact: Recent reporting indicates Austin Reaves will miss at least a month with a calf injury, which directly challenges the reliability of any GO recommendation depending on his availability.
refuting_facts.source_title: Austin Reaves will miss at least a month with calf injury - NBA.com

refuting_facts.fact: Multiple news reports and injury updates show Austin Reaves has been on the Lakers injury report and there is coverage of his return/status, highlighting uncertainty about his game availability.
refuting_facts.source_title: Lakers' Austin Reaves off injury report for Thursday - CBS Sports

refuting_facts.fact: News coverage documents Austin Reaves' injury situation and team updates, indicating evolving status that could invalidate model assumptions about his minutes/usage.
refuting_facts.source_title: Lakers Austin Reaves injury coverage - The Washington Post

supporting_facts.fact: Model lists Austin Reaves as a top GO play with positive EV (OVER 36.5 PRA, EV ≈ 0.3235) for DAL@LAL.
Model lists multiple GO plays concentrated on DAL@LAL including LeBron James (OVER 40.5 PRA and OVER 8.5 assists), Marcus Smart, and Jake LaRavia with positive EVs.

The deterministic data states the model uses market-implied fair probabilities with injury/roster/opponent adjustments and notes gaps where minutes/usage projections and SGP correlation use deterministic v0 rules.
